activities.name: Get Client Secret from Data Vault

dependsOn.activity: Get Client Secret from Data Vault

body.value:
@concat('grant_type=client_credentials',
'&client_id=', pipeline().globalParameters.app_client_id,
'&client_secret=', encodeUriComponent(activity('Get Client Secret from Data Vault').output.value),
'&resource=https://graph.microsoft.com')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	procedure_name
FROM
	[config].[stored_procedures]
WHERE
	procedure_type = 'REPORTING DIMENSION'
	AND is_active = 1

SELECT
	procedure_name
FROM
	[config].[stored_procedures]
WHERE
	procedure_type = 'REPORTING FACT'
	AND is_active = 1

dependsOn.activity: Load Power BI API Activity Events
